Headline: #26 South Shore Express Temporary Reroute near 87th/Commercial
ShortDescription: 26 South Shore Express buses temp. rerouted NB: Commercial, 87th, Burley and 83rd SB Commercial, 86th, Exchange, 87th and Commercial: near 87th/Commercial.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#26 South Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 87th/Commercial, due to police activity near 87th/Commercial.

Northbound buses will operate via Commercial, 87th, Burley and 83rd including the normal route streets.

Southbound buses will operate via Commercial, 86th, Exchange, 87th and Commercial.

Allow extra travel time.
